title: Sunny Daniels and the Tale of Tarot Cards and Movie Stars
description: Sunny Daniels is bored, so incredibly bored. After missing out on her chance to go to university, her dreams of becoming a big time film director are dwindling and the nightmare of working in her hippie mothers new age store for the rest of her life is quickly becoming her reality.When the chance to work as a runner on set for the latest teenage film craze comes up, the opportunity to get her foot in the door and spend two weeks in London feels like a dream come true. But she wonâ€™t be making it through her face day on the job, not if lead actor Nathan King has anything to do with it.Contains strong language and Mature themes.
author: Samantha  Pearce
